aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Aspect for defining an incident in context of Environmental and Social Standards as specified by the Catena-X Sustainability team.
Environmental and social standards related incident category according to Supply Chain Due Diligence Act
Full text description of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Picture(s) about the reported incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
System created time stamp when the incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) was issued and saved
Date and time information about when an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) occurred
Information about how long an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) occurred
Unique identifier for an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Incident Subcategory Property

aas:valueReferencePair.aas:value: Import and export of hazardous waste

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Incident Subcategory
Title/ subject of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Core information about an incident in context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).
Free-text description for commodity of a product affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Serial product/ part/ component number as defined by a unique identifier in Catena-X that is affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Description of product or component affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Part number that is affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Batch number that is affected by an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Raw material that causes an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Industry / Branch that causes the incident
Information about a product/ part/ component which refers to an incident in context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).
Country to which an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) belongs
Region within a country to which an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards) belongs
Longitude information for geographic coordinates.
Latitude information for geographic coordinates.
Exact geographic position of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Name of a company/ an organisation that is the originator of an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
Street name (and number) belonging to an address
Zip code belonging to an address
Name of a city belonging to an address.
Simple form of an address which can belong to a person, organisation, company etc.
BPN Property
BPN-L ID of the company headquarter that causes the incident
Return flag (y/n) that company that causes the ESS incident is a CX member (or not)
Return flag (y/n) that company that causes the ESS incident has a BPN-L/-S/-A in CX (but no CX membership)
BPN Property
BPN-S ID of the company headquarter that causes the incident
BPN Property
BPN-A ID of the company headquarter that causes the incident
Information about an originating company of an incident in context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards).
Name of a contact.
Mail address of a contact
Phone number of a contact.
Street name (and number) belonging to an address
Zip code belonging to an address
Name of a city belonging to an address.
Simple form of an address which can belong to a person, organisation, company etc.
Company name of incident issuer
System generated unique identifier of incident issuer
Flag that Incident issuer wants to be anonymous
Information about a contact who issued an incident in the context of ESS (Environmental and Social Standards)
